input.sentences: we heard about the local music festival going on and decided to check it out .
we ended up going to some of the booths | getting free swag from some of them .
they even had a ferris wheel .
the night ended with an epic headliner .
output.sentences: Music was easily heard from the local concert.
Several amazing bands entertained the crowd.
Free booths handed out awesome swag!
The best part was the big ferris wheel.
The headliner of the night was seriously epic!
